text:
I hope it’s not like prior rollouts of new ‘features’ for non-managed devices
that did indeed install onto the managed devices. 
BRIAN ILLNER 
| 
Senior Systems Administrator 
864.250.9227 Office 
864.679.2537 Fax 
Canal Insurance Company 
101 N. Main Street, Suite 400 
Greenville, SC 29601 
[cid:image001.jpg@01DA18C0.B7468310]

From: 'Jamie McNamara' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 16, 2023 1:57 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Windows 10 will be able to join in the fun of
Copilot 
CAUTION: This message was sent from outside of Canal Insurance. Please do not
click links or open attachments unless you recognize the source of this email
and know the content is safe. Please report all suspicious emails to
"infosec@canal-ins.com" as an attachment. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
So desperate to corner the LLM market they "found a way" to backport this to
windows 10. Amazing stuff over there at Microsoft. 
On Thu, Nov 16, 2023 at 10:40 AM 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement
<patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/BN6PR13MB291348D8803DB83150D72CBDC5B7A%40BN6PR13MB2913.namprd13.prod.outlook.com
